verses.text: And David assembled all the princes of Israel, the princes of the tribes, and the captains of the companies that ministered to the king by course, and the captains over the thousands, and captains over the hundreds, and the stewards over all the substance and possession of the king, and of his sons, with the officers, and \add with\add* the mighty \add men\add*, and with all the valiant men, unto Jerusalem.

Then David the king stood up upon his feet, and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people: \add As for me\add*, I \add had\add* in mine heart to build a house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the \sc Lord\sc*, and for the footstool of our God, and had made ready for the building:
but God said unto me, Thou shalt not build a house for my name, because thou \add hast been\add* a man of war, and hast shed blood.

Howbeit the \sc Lord\sc* God of Israel chose me before all the house of my father to be king over Israel for ever: for he hath chosen Judah to be the ruler; and of the house of Judah, the house of my father; and among the sons of my father he liked me to make \add me\add* king over all Israel:
and of all my sons, (for the \sc Lord\sc* hath given me many sons,) he hath chosen Solomon my son to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of the \sc Lord\sc* over Israel.
And he said unto me, Solomon thy son, he shall build my house and my courts: for I have chosen him to be my son, and I will be his father.
Moreover I will establish his kingdom for ever, if he be constant to do my commandments and my judgments, as \add at\add* this day.

Now therefore in the sight of all Israel the congregation of the \sc Lord\sc*, and in the audience of our God, keep and seek for all the commandments of the \sc Lord\sc* your God: that ye may possess \add this\add* good land, and leave \add it\add* for an inheritance for your children after you for ever.

And thou, Solomon my son, know thou the God of thy father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the \sc Lord\sc* searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts: if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.
Take heed now; for the \sc Lord\sc* hath chosen thee to build a house for the sanctuary: be strong, and do \add it\add*.

Then David gave to Solomon his son the pattern of the porch, and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper chambers thereof, and of the inner parlours thereof, and of the place of the mercy seat,

and the pattern of all that he had by the spirit, of the courts of the house of the \sc Lord\sc*, and of all the chambers round about, of the treasuries of the house of God, and of the treasuries of the dedicate \add things:\add*
also for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of the \sc Lord\sc*, and for all the vessels of service in the house of the \sc Lord\sc*.

\add He gave\add* of gold by weight for \add things of\add* gold, for all instruments of all manner of service; \add silver also\add* for all instruments of silver by weight, for all instruments of every kind of service:

even the weight for the candlesticks of gold, and \add for\add* their lamps of gold, by weight for every candlestick, and \add for\add* the lamps thereof: and for the candlesticks of silver by weight, \add both\add* for the candlestick, and \add also for\add* the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick.
And \add by\add* weight \add he gave\add* gold for the tables of shewbread, for every table; and \add likewise\add* silver for the tables of silver:

also pure gold \add for\add* the fleshhooks, and the bowls, and the cups: and for the golden basons \add he gave gold\add* by weight for every bason; and \add likewise silver\add* by weight for every bason of silver:

and for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubims, that spread out \add their wings\add*, and covered the ark of the covenant of the \sc Lord\sc*.
All \add this\add*, \add said David\add*, the \sc Lord\sc* made me understand in writing by \add his\add* hand upon me, \add even\add* all the works of \add this\add* pattern.

And David said to Solomon his son, Be strong and of good courage, and do \add it:\add* fear not, nor be dismayed: for the \sc Lord\sc* God, \add even\add* my God, \add will be\add* with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee, until \add thou\add* hast finished all the work for the service of the house of the \sc Lord\sc*.

And behold, the courses of the priests and the Levites, \add even they shall be with thee\add* for all the service of the house of God: and \add there shall be\add* with thee for all \add manner of\add* workmanship every willing skilful \add man\add*, for any \add manner of\add* service: also the princes and all the people \add will be\add* wholly at thy commandment.
